name: backend
description: Firebase backend system with Cloud Functions for storing and retrieving JSON documents

scripts.clean: tsx scripts/kill-emulators.ts && rm -rf firebase-export-* *.log functions/*.log ../*.log && rm -rf public
scripts.start-emulators: npm run kill-emulators && tsx scripts/generate-firebase-config.ts && export GCLOUD_PROJECT=splitifyd && tsx scripts/start-with-data.ts
scripts.deploy:prod: tsx scripts/switch-instance.ts prod && cd .. && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cd firebase && firebase deploy --only functions,firestore:rules,hosting && rm functions/.env
scripts.deploy:functions: tsx scripts/switch-instance.ts prod && firebase deploy --only functions && rm functions/.env
scripts.deploy:hosting: cd .. && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cd firebase && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.seed-policies:prod: tsx scripts/switch-instance.ts prod && tsx scripts/seed-policies.ts production && rm functions/.env
scripts.fix-users:prod: tsx scripts/switch-instance.ts prod && tsx scripts/fix-broken-users.ts production && rm functions/.env
scripts.paginate-users:prod: tsx scripts/switch-instance.ts prod && tsx scripts/paginate-users.ts production && rm functions/.env
